name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D Birthday Performance】Risu's Isekai Express ： Special Performance Delivery【#RiSekaiExpress】 [995QkX6r7RA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Ayunda Risu drives a truck through a neon-lit cyberpunk city while singing a melancholic song.
scenes.song_name: Night Travel through the Sleeping City

scenes.description: Instrumental break with cinematic shots of the city and the 'Risu Express' truck under a large moon.
Ayunda Risu performs 'Piano x Forte x Scandal' on a stage built atop the truck.

subtitles.original: 眠る街に夜行
subtitles.english: Night travel through the sleeping city

subtitles.original: 眠る街に夜行
subtitles.english: Night travel through the sleeping city

subtitles.original: もうすぐ終点だよ
subtitles.english: It's almost the last stop.

subtitles.original: さよなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye

subtitles.original: なんてことない気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like it was nothing special

subtitles.original: あの日の私と変わらない私に
subtitles.english: To the me who hasn't changed since that day

subtitles.original: もういいよ
subtitles.english: It's enough already

subtitles.original: 許してそれから
subtitles.english: Forgive me, and then...

subtitles.original: 眠る街に夜行
subtitles.english: Night travel through the sleeping city

subtitles.original: 眠る街に夜行をーよ
subtitles.english: Night travel through the sleeping city

subtitles.original: もういいよ
subtitles.english: It's enough already

subtitles.original: 疲れたよ
subtitles.english: I'm tired

subtitles.original: じゃあまたね
subtitles.english: Well then, see you later

subtitles.original: またね
subtitles.english: See you

subtitles.original: HIKARU SSS
subtitles.english: HIKARU SSS

subtitles.original: ピアノ×フォルテ×スキャンダル
subtitles.english: Piano x Forte x Scandal

subtitles.original: Lyrics, Music: OSTER project
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Music: OSTER project

subtitles.original: ありふれた私というコンチェルトなぞれる日々
subtitles.english: Days where I can trace the concerto of my mundane self

subtitles.original: それとなくタクトに合わせれば保証されるハーモニー
subtitles.english: Harmony is guaranteed if I casually follow the baton

subtitles.original: ダウンビート割とストイックでクラシカルな誘惑せいでーも
subtitles.english:
Even if the downbeat is somewhat stoic
and caused by classical temptation

subtitles.original: アップビートはアドリブで行かなきゃ退屈でしょ
subtitles.english: The upbeat must be an ad-lib, otherwise it's boring, right?

subtitles.original: あぁスコア通りの日常に枯れゆくこの命ならば
subtitles.english:
Ah, if this life of mine is to wither away
in a routine following the score

subtitles.original: いっそ背徳の渦に溺れてしまいたい
subtitles.english: I'd rather drown in a whirlpool of immorality

subtitles.original: その指に光る愛の証さえ消えそうなほど優しく
subtitles.english:
So gently that even the proof of love
shining on that finger seems to fade

subtitles.original: ささやいた言葉は禁断のセレナーデ
subtitles.english: The words whispered were a forbidden serenade

subtitles.original: 24時瞳を閉じれば想うのはあなたのことばかり
subtitles.english:
At midnight, when I close my eyes,
I think only of you

subtitles.original: そんなの良くないよなんて友達は言うけれど
subtitles.english: Friends say that's not good, but...

subtitles.original: あぁそんな言葉じゃ私の乾きが潤うことなどない
subtitles.english: Ah, words like that will never quench my thirst

subtitles.original: 可愛げないセリフでプライドが乱れ出す
subtitles.english: My pride begins to unravel with uncute lines

subtitles.original: 散らばったスコアの上ひび割れた愛が溶け散るその前に
subtitles.english:
Before the cracked love melts and
scatters on the scattered scores

subtitles.original: キスで繋ぎ止めて回り始めたラプソディ
subtitles.english:
Hold it together with a kiss,
the rhapsody has begun to turn

subtitles.original: 加速するアイドリズム突き詰めて確かめ合うように永久
subtitles.english:
Accelerating idolism, pushing it to the limit
to confirm each other forever

subtitles.original: フォルテッシモでもう強く強く抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Hold me tighter and tighter in fortissimo

subtitles.original: 重なり合うこの声は闇に溶けて消えてゆくから
subtitles.english:
Because these overlapping voices will
melt into the darkness and vanish

subtitles.original: きっと大丈夫よ何も悪いことじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm sure it'll be okay, it's nothing bad
